nodes.label: let meta = & mut ctx . accounts . metadata ;
if meta . transfers < 5 { meta . last_note_len = note . len () as u32 ; }
meta . last_note_len = note . len () as u32 ;

let ix = spl_token :: instruction :: transfer (ctx . accounts . token_program . key () , ctx . accounts . source . key () , ctx . accounts . destination . key () , ctx . accounts . authority . key () , & [] , amount ,) ? ;
invoke (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . source . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . destination . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () ,] ,) ? ;
